## Concepts

-   Tidyverse functions take a data frame as their first argument

. . .

-   Data transformation can be done in data pipelines with **dplyr**

```{r}
#| eval: false
df |>
  select(...) |>
  filter(...) |>
  mutate(...) |>
  group_by(...) |>
  summarize(...)
```

. . .

-   Data visualizations can be built layer-by-layer with **ggplot2**

```{r}
#| eval: false
ggplot(df, aes(x = ..., y = ...)) +
  geom_*(...) +
  scale_*() +
  facet_*(...) +
  labs(...)
```
